DOC.brief_title: Computer Assisted Orthognathic Surgery . Facial Asymmetry
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose randomize , control , clinical study , evaluate accurate procedure orthognathic correction facial asymmetry . The investigator compare two different method surgical planning : classical ( esthetic analysis face , cephalometric study skull lateral posteroanterior cephalograms , analysis surgical simulation plaster cast mount semi-individual articulator , development surgical acrylic resin intermediate splint ) digital planning ( cone-beam compute tomography , data acquisition , software-assisted virtual surgery -Maxilim ; Medicim , Mechelen , Belgium- CAD/CAM process surgical intermediate splint ) .
DOC.criteria: facial asymmetry mandibular deviation ( cant occlusal plane > 3Â° and/or midline discrepancy > 2.5 mm ) presence central incisor , pre postoperative radiograph plaster cast ( group 1 ) cranial CBCT image ( group 2 ) pre postoperative digital photograph . previous trauma involve hard soft facial tissue functional deviation mandible incomplete record ( CBCT , radiograph , cast digital photograph ) .
